sentences.sContent: As we age, the lenses of the eyes thicken, and thus refract light differently.
sentences.sCn: 随着我们年龄的增长，眼睛的晶状体变厚，因此对光线的折射也会发生变化。

remMethod.val: re (相反) + fract (打破) → 使反向破裂 → 使折射

words.tran: [光] 折射率；折射性；[物] 折射本领

trans.tranOther: if glass or water refracts light, the light changes direction when it passes through the glass or water
